title: Zakat al Fitr for a married woman still living with parents
transcript: zeyneb says i want to ask a question about the cattle fitter and married so she's living with her parents and her husband is in America who's responsible for payment if the marriage was consummated her husband is supposed to pay but if he doesn't know who to pay it to an America there is no problem in sending the money to them in her country to distribute upon the poor
